item.title: Active Carbon Face Mask Ear Loop 4 ply
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications
Width across face : 175 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth in full : 175 mm + / - 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Loop size : 155 mm + / - 5 mm
item.content:encoded:
Activated Carbon Filter Face Mask, 4 ply is made of Polypropelyne Spunbond, Meltblown nonwoven fabric and Active Carbon Filter Fabric with adjustable nose strip to give maximum protection and comfort to the user.
It’s mainly used for protection odour.Â  Avaliable with flat or round elastic (latex free) style industrial environment.

Specifications

Width across face : 175 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth in full : 175 mm + / – 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Loop size : 155 mm + / – 5 mm

 

 

Components

1st layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
2nd layer : Active carbon Filter Fiber
3rd layer : Meltblown Nonwoven
4th layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
Nose strip : PE wire ( Metal Free)
Ear-Loop : Flat elastic or round elastic (latex free)


Benefit and standards

  • Excellent breathability
  • Non irritating, fiber glass free fabric
  • 100% Polyplopylene Non-woven spunbond
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Splash Resistant
  • Ultrasonic welding manufacturing process
  • Comply with EN 14683, CE marking, ISO 9001 and 14001

Packing
50 pcs per dispenser box,
20 dispenser boxes per carton (1000 pcs)

Available
Black colour (carbon filter with any other colour coverings)

item.title: Face Mask For Children (age 7-12) Ear Loop 3 ply
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications
Width across face : 175 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth in full : 150 mm + / - 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Loop size : 130 mm + / - 5 mm
item.content:encoded:
Face Mask, 3 ply is made of Polypropylene Spunbond and Meltblown Nonwoven fabric with adjustable nose strip and flat or round elastic ear-loop to give basic protection to the children in age 7-12.

Specifications

Width across face : 175 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth in full : 150 mm + / – 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Loop size : 130 mm + / – 5 mm

 

Components

1st layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
2nd layer : Meltblown Nonwoven
3rd layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
Nose strip : PE wire (Metal Free)
Ear-Loop : Flat elastic or round elastic (latex free)


Benefit and standards

  • BFE (Bacterial Filtration Efficiency) 99% ( tested by Nelson lab)
  • Excellent breathability
  • Non irritating, fiber glass free fabric
  • 100% Polyplopylene Non – woven spunbond
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Splash resistant
  • Comply with EN 14683, CE marking, ISO 9001 and 14001
  • Ultrasonic welding manufacturing process
  • Hygienic
  • 3rd layer Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
  • Nose strip PE wire ( Metal Free)
  • Ultrasonic welding

Packing
50 pcs per dispenser box,
20 dispenser boxes per carton (1000 pcs)

Available
White, Blue, Green colour, as requested
Cartoon pattern with up to three colours
inner and outer ear loop with any colour as requested

item.title: Face Masks Ear Loop 3 ply
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications
Width across face : 175 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Depth in full : 175 mm + / - 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / - 2 mm
Loop size : 155 mm + / - 5 mm
item.content:encoded:
Face Mask, 3 ply is made of Polypropylene Spunbond and Meltblown nonwoven fabrics with adjustable nose strip and flat or round elastic ear – loop to give basic protection to the user.
It’s mainly used in medical, dental, cleanroom, critical environment, food handling/production and industrial manufacturing.

Specifications

Width across face : 175 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth pleated : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Depth in full : 175 mm + / – 2 mm
Nose strip : 95 mm + / – 2 mm
Loop size : 155 mm + / – 5 mm

Components

1st layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
2nd layer : Meltblown Nonwoven
3rd layer : Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven
Nose strip : PE wire (Metal Free)
Ear-Loop : Flat elastic or round elastic (latex free)


Benefit and standards

  • BFE (Bacterial Filtration Efficiency) 99% (tested by Nelson lab)
  • Excellent breath ability
  • Non irritating, fiber glass free fabric
  • Non-woven spunbond 100% Polyplopylene
  • Hypoallergenic
  • Splash resistant
  • Comply with EN 14683, ISO 9001 and 14001
  • Ultrasonic welding manufacturing process
  • Hygienic

Available

White, Blue, Green color, as requested. with cartoon pattern up to three colors.
Inner and outer ear loop with any color as requested.
